attachments.author_name: Learn How to Use Emoji Reactions
attachments.text: :white_large_square: *Add an emoji reaction to this message* :thinking_face:

fields.value: You can quickly respond to any message on Slack with an emoji reaction. Reactions can be used for any purpose: voting, checking off to-do items, showing excitement.

attachments.author_name: Learn How to Pin a Message

fields.value: Important messages and files can be pinned to the details pane in any channel or direct message, including group messages, for easy reference.

attachments.author_name: Learn How to Share a Message in Slack

fields.value: Sharing messages in Slack can help keep conversations on your team organized. And, it's easy to do!
